name: Negra 44
description: Negra 44 is an indica-dominant strain bred by R-Kiem Seeds in Spain. This award-winning variety crosses a Top 44 indica with native Ghana landrace strains, and inherits an earthy, fruity aroma. Indoors, Negra 44 flowers in 8 weeks while outdoor gardens are ready for harvest at the end of September. Negra 44 produces dark green buds and has adapted over time to suit Mediterranean climates.
descriptionPlain: Negra 44 is an indica-dominant strain bred by R-Kiem Seeds in Spain. This award-winning variety crosses a Top 44 indica with native Ghana landrace strains, and inherits an earthy, fruity aroma. Indoors, Negra 44 flowers in 8 weeks while outdoor gardens are ready for harvest at the end of September. Negra 44 produces dark green buds and has adapted over time to suit Mediterranean climates.

highlightedReviews.text: excellent mix of earthy and fruity taste. compact weed almost shiny with crystals. awesome weed
Hard to come across, very amazing effects, more of an all rounded high, i enjoyed this as much as some top shelf bud, paid roughly 6 a gram but well worth it!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Sunset Sherbert, Purple Jack, Dieseltonic, Devil Fruit, and Negra 44
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week’s new strains are an exciting medley of indicas and hybrids for those sleepless nights or relaxed weekends. Our first hybrid is Sunset Sherbert, a powerful and invigorating strain that inherits the very best of its GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) parent. The indicas Negra 44 and Devil Fruit are Barcelona Cannabis Cup champions, as is the high-CBD hybrid Dieseltonic. Purple Jack may be a familiar flower for U.S. connoisseurs and is a must-have for fans of Jack Herer and Purple Kush.
These newcomers are in need of review, so get to it if you’ve tried one already!
1. Sunset Sherbert
Characteristics of Sunset Sherbert:

Hybrid strain
Cross between GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) and Pink Panties
Skunky citrus and sweet berry aroma
Delivers powerful full-body effects elevated by a jolt of cerebral energy
Good for stress, tension, and sour moods

2. Purple Jack
Characteristics of Purple Jack:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Jack Herer and Purple Kush
Fruity, spicy aroma
Brings mental energy and a full-body calm
Conducive for sleep and rest

3. Dieseltonic
Characteristics of Dieseltonic:

High-CBD hybrid strain
Cross between NYC Diesel and Cannatonic
Breeder: Resin Seeds (Spain)
Sweet orange aroma
Provides energizing and uplifting effects
May help with mood disorders, pain, inflammation, and spasms
Flowers in 8 to 9 weeks indoors

4. Devil Fruit
Characteristics of Devil Fruit:

70% indica
High-CBD strain
Cross between Shiskaberry and Great White Shark
Breeder: Medical Seed Co. (Spain)
Sweet and spicy aroma
Provides light cerebral stimulation and comfortable full-body effects
Flowers in 65 days indoors

5. Negra 44
Characteristics of Negra 44:

Indica strain
Cross between Top 44 and Ghana landrace strains
Breeder: R-Kiem Seeds (Spain)
Earthy, fruity aroma
Flowers in 8 weeks indoors

articles.title: The First Annual Barcelona Social Clubs Cannabis Cup: And the Winners Are...
articles.author: Rebecca Kelley
articles.text:
Last month on March 23, Leafly was fortunate to sponsor Barcelona's first Social Clubs Cannabis Cup. It was an intimate gathering of about 500 attendees and 50 Cup entries, but as we all know, great things have small beginnings. The event itself took place at El Pueblo Español (or "Poble Espanyol"), a very cool "village museum" where each structure in the museum represents a village or town in Spain.

El Pueblo Español in Barcelona.
This visually-arresting video recaps the Social Clubs Cannabis Cup event, so if you want to dust off your high school Spanish (or if you're fluent), watch below:

Here are the Social Clubs Cannabis Cup winners broken down into the following categories: Best Indica, Best Sativa, Best Hash, and Best Concentrates. Congratulations to all of the winners! We expect next year's Cup to be an even greater success.
 
Top Indica Cannabis Strains
First Place: K-Lité Social Club with MK Ultra
Second Place: C Social Club with La Negra 44
Third Place: Senzi Club with Critical
 
Top Sativa Cannabis Strains
First Place: Choko Club with Chocolope
Second Place: Kush Bcn Club with Amnesia
Third Place: Resin Club with Diesel Tonic
 
Top Hash
First Place: Roots Club with ice-extraction Amnesia
Second Place: Sibaritas with ice-extraction White Widow
Third Place: Senzi Club with Somali
 
Top Concentrates
First Place: La Línea Verde with Y Griega shatter
Second Place: Padri Club with Tahoe Kush amber glass/shatter
Third Place: Kush Bcn with Devil Fruit budder
Poble Espanyol image credit: Wikipedia
